sources.name: Dow cuts 4,500 jobs (13% of workforce) citing AI and automation adoption
sources.notes: Dow cuts 4,500 jobs (13% of workforce) citing AI and automation adoption

summary: Dow cuts 4,500 jobs (13% of workforce) citing AI and automation adoption: On January 29, 2026, Dow Chemical announced cutting approximately 4,500 jobs — 13% of its 36,000-person workforce. CEO Jim Fitterling framed the restructuring around 'reducing complexity' and adopting
